villageHall.name: Village Hall
villageHall.description: The Village Hall allows you to purchase town structures and earns your kingdom 500 gold per day.

townHall.name: Town Hall
townHall.description: The Town Hall allows you to purchase town structures and earns your kingdom 1000 gold per day.

cityHall.name: City Hall
cityHall.description: The City Hall allows you to purchase town structures and earns your kingdom 2000 gold per day.

capitol.name: Capitol
capitol.description: The Capitol earns your kingdom 4000 gold per day.

fort.name: Fort
fort.description: The Fort provides your town with defensive walls.

citadel.name: Citadel
citadel.description: Including a 50% increase to base creature growth, the Citadel adds a keep, and other terrain obstacles, to a town's defenses.

castle.name: Castle
castle.description: The Castle adds two arrow towers, fortifies your town's defenses, and doubles base creature growth.

tavern.name: Tavern
tavern.description: The Tavern increases morale for troops defending the city.

blacksmith.name: Blacksmith
blacksmith.description: The Blacksmith provides your armies with Ammo Carts.

marketplace.name: Marketplace
marketplace.description: With the Marketplace, you can buy and sell resources (exchange rates increase with each Marketplace you own).

resourceSilo.name: Resource Silo
resourceSilo.description: The Resource Silo provides you with an additional +1 gems each day.

special1.name: Artifact Merchants
special1.description: For a nominal fee, you can purchase artifacts from the Artifact Merchants.

special2.name: Lookout Tower
special2.description: The lookout tower extends the visible distance around your city.

special3.name: Library
special3.description: The library provides your mage guild with additional spells.

special4.name: Wall of Knowledge
special4.description: The Wall of Knowledge increases the Knowledge skill of any visiting hero by +1.

horde1.name: Sculptor's Wings
horde1.description: The Sculptor's Wings increase Stone Gargoyle production by 4 per week.

horde1Upgr.name: Sculptor's Wings
horde1Upgr.description: The Sculptor's Wings increase Obsidian Gargoyle production by 4 per week.

grail.name: Skyship
grail.description: The presence of the Skyship increases weekly creature generation by 50%, provides your kingdom with an additional 5000 gold each day, reveals the entire world map, and increases the knowledge of any defending hero by +15 (these spell points do not follow a hero who leaves the town).

mageGuild1.name: Mage Guild Level 1
mageGuild1.description: Entering the Mage Guild will allow a visiting hero to learn the spells kept within.

mageGuild2.name: Mage Guild Level 2
mageGuild2.description: Entering the Mage Guild will allow a visiting hero to learn the spells kept within.

mageGuild3.name: Mage Guild Level 3
mageGuild3.description: Entering the Mage Guild will allow a visiting hero to learn the spells kept within.

mageGuild4.name: Mage Guild Level 4
mageGuild4.description: Entering the Mage Guild will allow a visiting hero to learn the spells kept within.

mageGuild5.name: Mage Guild Level 5
mageGuild5.description: Entering the Mage Guild will allow a visiting hero to learn the spells kept within.

dwellingLvl1.name: Workshop
dwellingLvl1.description: The Workshop allows you to recruit Gremlins.

dwellingLvl2.name: Parapet
dwellingLvl2.description: The Parapet allows you to recruit Stone Gargoyles.

dwellingLvl3.name: Golem Factory
dwellingLvl3.description: The Golem Factory allows you to recruit Stone Golems.

dwellingLvl4.name: Mage Tower
dwellingLvl4.description: The Mage Tower allows you to recruit Magi.

dwellingLvl5.name: Altar of Wishes
dwellingLvl5.description: The Altar of Wishes allows you to recruit Genies.

dwellingLvl6.name: Golden Pavilion
dwellingLvl6.description: The Golden Pavilion allows you to recruit Nagas.

dwellingLvl7.name: Cloud Temple
dwellingLvl7.description: The Cloud Temple allows you to recruit Giants.

dwellingUpLvl1.name: Upg. Workshop
dwellingUpLvl1.description: The Workshop allows you to recruit Master Gremlins.

dwellingUpLvl2.name: Upg. Parapet
dwellingUpLvl2.description: The Parapet allows you to recruit Obsidian Gargoyles.

dwellingUpLvl3.name: Upg. Golem Factory
dwellingUpLvl3.description: The Golem Factory allows you to recruit Iron Golems.

dwellingUpLvl4.name: Upg. Mage Tower
dwellingUpLvl4.description: The Mage Tower allows you to recruit Arch Magi.

dwellingUpLvl5.name: Upg. Altar of Wishes
dwellingUpLvl5.description: The Altar of Wishes allows you to recruit Master Genies.

dwellingUpLvl6.name: Upg. Golden Pavilion
dwellingUpLvl6.description: The Golden Pavilion allows you to recruit Naga Queens.

dwellingUpLvl7.name: Upg. Cloud Temple
dwellingUpLvl7.description: The Cloud Temple allows you to recruit Titans.
